dcterms:creator: Jacob Andreas
Dan Klein
Sergey Levine
dcterms:description: A 2D Minecraft-inspired crafting game where the agent can navigate and collect resources, build tools at workshops, and use tools to traverse obstacles. The agent can only observe a limited area around its current position, and tasks consist of randomly generated maps and goals.
dcterms:title: 2D Minecraft-inspired environment

dcterms:creator: Vinicius Zambaldi

Yujia Li

Timothy Lillicrap

Murray Shanahan
Victoria Langston
Razvan Pascanu
Matthew Botvinick
Oriol Vinyals
Peter Battaglia
dcterms:description: A grid world environment that requires abstract reasoning, where the agent must unlock boxes using keys of corresponding colors. The agent can only observe a limited area around its current position, and tasks consist of randomly generated maps and initial positions.
dcterms:title: Box-world

dcterms:creator: E. Todorov
T. Erez
Y. Tassa
dcterms:description: A physics engine for model-based control, used in continuous control tasks where the agent is represented by a simulated ant that can perform crafting tasks.
dcterms:title: MuJoCo Ant
